description:
A React project with an experienced WEB developer. This program was fast-paced and required fast learning. We decided to use and learn about the most relevant complementary technologies for this project such as:
  • React
  • Next.js
  • Redux
  • MongoDB Atlas
  • Apolo JS
  • GraphQL
I can not give details about this project but I will be sure to upload it once it is in the air.
